com.braintreegateway
Class PagedCollection<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.braintreegateway.PagedCollection<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of object being paged, e.g. Transaction or Customer.
public class PagedCollection<T>
extends java.lang.Object

A collection used to page through query or search results.

Constructor Summary
PagedCollection(Pager<T> pager, NodeWrapper response, java.lang.Class<T> klass)
           
 
Method Summary
 int getCurrentPageNumber()
          Returns the page the collection is currently on.
 int getCurrentPageSize()
          Returns the number of objects on the current page.
 java.util.List<T> getItems()
          Returns a list of the items for the current page.
 PagedCollection<T> getNextPage()
          Returns the next page of results.
 int getPageSize()
          Returns the number of objects on each page.
 int getTotalItems()
          Returns the total number of items on all pages.
 int getTotalPages()
          Returns the total number of pages.
 boolean isLastPage()
          Returns whether or not this is the last page.

Method Detail

getCurrentPageNumber

public int getCurrentPageNumber()
Returns the page the collection is currently on.

getCurrentPageSize

public int getCurrentPageSize()
Returns the number of objects on the current page.

See Also:
getPageSize()

getItems

public java.util.List<T> getItems()
Returns a list of the items for the current page.

Returns:
List of objects being paged, e.g. Transaction or Customer.

getNextPage

public PagedCollection<T> getNextPage()
Returns the next page of results.

Returns:
PagedCollection or null if the current page is the last page

getPageSize

public int getPageSize()
Returns the number of objects on each page. This value is always fixed, and does not change for pages with less items.

See Also:
getCurrentPageSize()

getTotalItems

public int getTotalItems()
Returns the total number of items on all pages.

getTotalPages

public int getTotalPages()
Returns the total number of pages.

isLastPage

public boolean isLastPage()
Returns whether or not this is the last page.
